thread.section_title: Mikes Dive Store Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of mikesdivestore.com
thread.title: Robert Elvy
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Robert Elvy

author: Robert Elvy
title: Robert Elvy
text: There are many dive shops on line, with varying degrees of reliability, pricing and range. Mike's delivers on all three fronts. They have a good range of products, competitively priced, and are very responsive to questions. (I queried the description of a DIN to INT adaptor, and had an answer within an hour). Delivery is predictable - they deliver when they say they will. What more could one ask for!
